mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into material_transfer_application_detail (company_id, material_transfer_application_id, name, num, model, unit, amount, price, money, cst_create, cst_modified, is_del ) values (#{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{materialTransferApplicationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, now(), now(), false )
mapper.update: update material_transfer_application_detail set company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, material_transfer_application_id = #{materialTransferApplicationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, num = #{num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cst_create = #{cstCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cst_modified = #{cstModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_del = #{del,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, company_id, material_transfer_application_id, name, num, model, unit, amount, price, money, cst_create, cst_modified, is_del from material_transfer_application_detail where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, company_id, material_transfer_application_id, name, num, model, unit, amount, price, money, cst_create, cst_modified, is_del from material_transfer_application_detail

select id, company_id, material_transfer_application_id, name, num, model, unit, amount, price, money, cst_create, cst_modified, is_del from material_transfer_application_detail where material_transfer_application_id=#{transferApplicationId} and is_del=false

select id, company_id, material_transfer_application_id, name, num, model, unit, amount, price, money, cst_create, cst_modified, is_del from material_transfer_application_detail where material_transfer_application_id=#{transferApplicationId} and is_del=false for update
